Charm.Action: One humanoid <NL> can see within 30 feet of <GL2> must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day.
Charm.Name: Charm

Teleport.Action: <NU> magically teleports, along with any equipment <GL1> is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space <GL1> can see.
Teleport.Name: Teleport
